column1: #text=Today , we went to the library to check out some books .
#text=A lot of people lke to borrow books from the library for all kinds of reasons but we just wanted some books to read for fun .
#text=We already knew which books we wanted before we got to the library so when we got there , we just had to find them .
#text=It is possible to look them up and find them on the libary 's computer .
#text=If you are in a hurry , you can ask the librarian to help you find them a little easier and more quickly .
#text=When we found out where to find the ones we wanted , we found them and took them to the librarian to check them out to us .
#text=She put the book information in the computer and then she swiped our library cards .
#text=It did n't take very long at all .
#text=when shed put them into the system and swiped the cards , she printed out a slip of paper that showed exactly what day we needed to turn them back in , in order to avoid any late fees .
#text=when we were ready to take them back , we turned them in to the librarian and then looked for more !
